dict.acceptation: 存在，实在；生活，生活方式；实体，存在物；

sent.orig: Love, falls in love with a person, likes his existence, also loves him and your existence.
sent.trans: 爱情，就是爱上一个人，爱他的存在，也爱他和自己的共同存在。

sent.orig: The reason expresses the existence and the existence is the foundation of the reason.
sent.trans: 理性表达了生存，生存是理性的根基。

sent.orig: The property verification's phase determines the existence non-existence of a property in a program.
sent.trans: 特性验证的阶段确定一个程序中是否存在某个特性。

sent.orig: It is therefore beyond our conceptions of good and evil, right and wrong, existence and non-existence.
sent.trans: 因此它超越于我们善与恶，是与非，存在和不存在的观念。

sent.orig: All the existence in the nature can obtain its significance of existence in human's practice finally.
sent.trans: 只要是自然界的存在物，那就最终都能在人的实践活动中获得其存在的意义。
